title: Annual Tech Fest
description: Join us for the biggest technology festival of the year featuring coding competitions, tech talks, and innovation showcases.

title: Cultural Night
description: A vibrant evening celebrating diverse cultures with music, dance, and performances from students across different backgrounds.

title: Sports Championship
description: Inter-college sports championship featuring cricket, football, basketball, and athletics competitions.

title: Career Fair 2025
description: Connect with top recruiters and explore career opportunities. Workshops on resume building and interview skills.

title: Science Exhibition
description: Showcase of innovative science projects and experiments by students. Open to all science enthusiasts.

title: Music Concert
description: An electrifying night of live music performances by student bands and professional artists.
